column4: hello, is there a way to filter messages *as they come* in evolution or kmail? the filters do not seem to work upon reciept of messages in either program.
I have it working with kontact/kmail.  I assume you already installed spamassassain separately?

im actually trying to filter stuff from one folder to another, I have mailing list stuff that pollutes the inbox and I don't need to see these regularly... but I tried using lots of different methods and couldn't get kmail or evoution to filter unless I explicity selected the message and applied the filter
OIC what you are saying.  Actually, I found it easier to create rules based on clicking on the message itself in kmail.  You can create a rule based on mailing list which worked great
